title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, push, create, list, copy, delete, and show models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama with Node.js and browser support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models via the langchain-ollama PyPI package.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’) with model management, RAG, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with TUI chat mode.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC persistence.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that wraps Ollama for CI/CD pipelines to test LLM prompts.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Experimental Flutter desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async HTTP and std/json support.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider and facade for Ollama with queue-friendly jobs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for scalable inference.
